text: Recreation Park is a public, urban park in El Segundo, California, a suburb of Los Angeles. Located adjacent to Downtown El Segundo, Recreation Park is bordered by Pine Street on the North, Eucalyptus Drive on the West, and houses on the South and East. ==References== Category:Parks in Los Angeles County, California Category:El Segundo, California Category:Geography of Los Angeles Category:Parks in Los Angeles
title: Recreation Park (El Segundo)
